title: Screenshot
body: Alright, so I went to go queue in for a quick Beginner Bot game on Summoner's Rift right? I choose my champion which is Akali, and for some reason when I try to click on the "Lock In" button, it just turns grey and I'm not able to lock in. So as soon as the count down went to 0, the client "kicked" me and gave me the 5 minute penalty that I show in the screenshot using Lightshot. Hopefully this doesn't count towards to anything bad on my account as it wasn't my fault at all, as the client wouldn't let me lock in at all.

replies.body: It did the same thing to me but instead I can't login now for some reason! (I hope I don't get a ban.){{sticker:cass-cry}}
